Mary Donnelly

  1. Foster Name: Mary
  2. Foster Family: William and Katherine Riley
  3. Location of Family: Dawson, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Lincoln, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 1
  7. Date of Birth: 1909-11-08, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 2007-07-18, Scottsdale, AZ
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Mary Beckwith
  11. Spouse Name: Harry Beckwith
  12. Notes: Obit says she had a brother named John, also adopted by same family.
  13. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; OTR 623; Eloise Thomsen Corres.
